title: Why Wang Qiang still considered a visitor

content.question: Why is Wang Qiang still considered a visitor to Beijing after living there for several years?

choices.label: He has not purchased a house yet.
He usually stays home on weekends.
He spends every weekend in his hometown.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
